In the description of the challenge the creator tells us that the password is stored as an integer inside the application. This means that searching for strings wonâ€™t give us anything of importance. Inside the main function a â€œputsâ€ call is made and after it a call to a custom function. Inside it a â€œscanfâ€ call is made with the value being stored in the third argument. The third argument is then compared against the value â€œ502590â€ and if the given password is equal to it a success message is shown.
